localized title: Ei Poth Jodi Na Shesh Hoye
plot outline: In 1941, Dr. Abhay Mitra is sentenced to life imprisonment in a labour camp in Siberia where he befriends a diverse group of people. Together, they dare to escape the prison and embark on a treacherous journey across five countries, on foot, in a desperate race for freedom and survival.
title: Ei Poth Jodi Na Shesh Hoye
akas: Ei Poth Jodi Na Shesh Hoye (India)
plot: In 1941, Dr. Abhay Mitra is sentenced to life imprisonment in a labour camp in Siberia where he befriends a diverse group of people. Together, they dare to escape the prison and embark on a treacherous journey across five countries, on foot, in a desperate race for freedom and survival.
